Description: Arm from a wooden figure with a hole in the clenched hand for a staff; mortise and tenon at the shoulder; incised representation of Horus at the joint. An exact match in size and quality to 45207. The image of Horus on the shoulder joint is also a match to the image of Seth on the shoulder joint of 45206.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
